item.description: About Hi, I’m John. Here is some relevant (and possibly irrelevant) information about me: I am based in Brooklyn, New York. I have an interest in physically based shading, parallel algorithms, visual effects, and technical art. I am currently a Staff Graphics Engineer at Unity Technologies. What I love about real-time computer graphics is how it forces us to reconcile our observations of light, materials, and geometry with tight hardware constraints; resulting in clever ideas, and great engineering.
